constrained). Thus particular attention has been paid to relating outcomes to resources. The 
indicators that could be obtained, e.g. CHNWs/1000, do not reflect quality, training, incentives, 
supervision and other crucial factors which should be included in future studies. CHNWs/1000 
may also be an available proxy indicator of broader programme effort.
